user.title: OpenData South Tyrol
user.description:
This integration uses data provided by [Open Data South Tyrol](https://data.civis.bz.it/dataset) under the Creative Commons CC0 1.0 Universal - Public Domain Dedication (CC0 1.0) license.

Not all available data types are supported by this integration.

Supported data types: {supported_types}.

The configuration data is retrieved in real time from the provided API, and loading may take a few seconds.

Integration version: {version}

language.title: Language Selection
language.description:
This integration uses data provided by [Open Data South Tyrol](https://data.civis.bz.it/dataset) under the Creative Commons CC0 1.0 Universal - Public Domain Dedication (CC0 1.0) license.

Not all available data types are supported by this integration.

The configuration data is retrieved in real time from the provided API, and loading may take a few seconds.

Select the language of the data provided by the API.
This choice will affect the language of the displayed content during configuration and the retrieved data.

Integration version: {version}

xml.title: XML Element Selection
xml.description:
Select the element to monitor in the XML file.
A preview is shown to assist you in the selection.

group.title: Group Selection
group.description:
The data is organized into thematic groups.
Select the group that contains the data you are interested in.
This choice will determine which datasets will be available in the next step.

The configuration data is retrieved in real time from the provided API, and loading may take a few seconds.

package.title: Dataset Selection
package.description:
Choose the specific dataset to monitor within the selected group.
Each dataset contains data related to a specific theme.

The configuration data is retrieved in real time from the provided API, and loading may take a few seconds.

API URL: {api_url}

resource.title: Resource Selection
resource.description:
Select the data resource to monitor.
Resources are the actual data sources within the selected dataset.

The configuration data is retrieved in real time from the provided API, and loading may take a few seconds.

Not all available data types are supported by this integration.

API URL: {api_url}

rows.title: Row Selection

fields.title: Field Selection
fields.description:
Select the field to monitor.
This value will become a sensor in Home Assistant.
For each field, the current value is shown as a preview.

API URL: {api_url}

confirm.title: Configuration Confirmation
confirm.description:
Home Assistant will create the following sensor:

{fields_preview}

previews.wfs: A WFS tracker will be created

excel_coordinates.title: Select the Excel Cell to Monitor
excel_coordinates.description:
You can download the Excel file here: {url}

Enter the coordinates of the cell you want to monitor:

data.excel_column: Column letter (e.g., A, B, C, AA)

excel_confirm.title: Confirm Excel Cell Selection
excel_confirm.description:
You have selected cell {cell}, which contains the value: {value}

Enter a descriptive name for this sensor:

error.cannot_connect: Unable to connect to the API
error.invalid_xlsx: The Excel file cannot be read or is invalid
error.no_fields_available: No fields available in the data
error.no_rows_available: No items available in the data
error.no_packages: No datasets available in the selected group
error.no_json_resources: No resources available in the dataset
error.no_xml_resources: No elements found in the XML file
error.invalid_coordinates:
Invalid coordinates. Check that:
- The column letter is correct (A-Z, AA-ZZ)
- The row number exists in the file
- The cell contains a value
error.empty_cell:
The selected cell is empty or contains an invalid value.
Select a cell that contains a numeric value.
